HTMLElementVirtualKeyboardPolicy.summary: The virtualKeyboardPolicy property of the interface gets and sets a string indicating the on-screen virtual keyboard behavior on devices such as tablets, mobile phones, or other devices where a hardware keyboard may not be available, if the element's content is editable (for example, it is an {{htmlelement("input")}} or {{htmlelement("textarea")}} element, or an element with the contenteditable attribute set).

remarks.para: It reflects the value of the virtualkeyboardpolicy HTML global attribute.
